20101206231600.000|20101206231602.000|CCO|WANT TO BE HERE, EDDIE?

20101206232542.000|20101206232543.429|CCO|DID.
20101206232543.429|20101206232544.857|CCO|OPRAH: OK. WHAT DO WE ACTUALLY
